<template>
  
  <HelloWorld></HelloWorld>
  
</template>

<script>
import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld.vue'

export default {
  components: {
    HelloWorld
  },
  
    toggleTheme() {
      this.isDarkTheme = !this.isDarkTheme;
      // 保存到 localStorage 或其他持久化存储
      localStorage.setItem('theme', this.isDarkTheme ? 'dark' : 'light');
    }
  }
  
</script>


<style> 
</style>
